content.description: Experience durability and style with our Product Gallery. Perfect for both residential and commercial spaces, these tiles combine innovation and elegance.

list.title: Porcelain Tiles
list.description: Similar to ceramic tiles but made from denser clay, porcelain tiles are fired at higher temperatures. They are highly durable and resistant to water and stains.

list.title: Vitrified Tiles
list.description: Vitrified tiles are a type of ceramic tile with low porosity. They are made by a process called vitrification, where the clay and silica materials are heated together at high temperatures to form a glass-like substance.

list.title: Nano Tiles
list.description: Nano tiles are ceramic or porcelain tiles that undergo a treatment using nanotechnology to enhance their properties.

list.title: Glazed Vitrified Tiles (GVT)
list.description: Glazed Vitrified Tiles are a type of ceramic tile that undergoes vitrification, a process where the tile is fired at high temperatures to make it dense and less porous.

content.description: Sanitary ware refers to the various fixtures and fittings in a bathroom or washroom that are designed for hygiene and sanitation purposes.

list.title: Toilets
list.description: Fixtures designed for the disposal of human waste, typically including a bowl, flushing mechanism, and seat.

list.title: Basins or Sinks
list.description: Used for washing hands, face, and other personal hygiene activities.

list.title: Bidets
list.description: Fixtures used for washing the genital and perianal areas after using the toilet.

list.title: Urinals
list.description: Fixtures designed for males to urinate into, commonly found in public restrooms.

list.title: Baths
list.description: Fixtures for bathing, available in various styles.

list.title: Accessories
list.description: Includes various accessories such as soap dispensers, towel rails, and toilet paper holders.

content.description: Roofing tiles are building materials designed for covering the roof of a structure.

list.title: Clay Roof Tiles
list.description: Made from natural clay, these tiles are durable and fire-resistant.

list.title: Jali Tiles
list.description: Tiles with a lattice or perforated design, used in various architectural features.

content.description: Immerse yourself in the timeless beauty of our Product Gallery.

list.title: Kitchen Wall Tiles
list.description: Tiles that blend functionality with style for culinary spaces.

list.title: Bathroom Wall Tiles
list.description: Tiles that transform your bathroom into a spa-like oasis.

list.title: Living Room Accent Tiles
list.description: Accent wall tiles that add depth and character to your living room.
